org.apache.flex.compiler.common

Class SourceLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.common.SourceLocation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISourceLocation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CSSCombinator, CSSDocument, CSSFontFace, CSSKeyFrames, CSSMediaQueryCondition, CSSNamespaceDefinition, CSSProperty, CSSPropertyValue, CSSRule, CSSSelector, CSSSelectorCondition, CSSTypedNode, MXMLTagAttributeData, MXMLUnitData, NodeBase

    public class SourceLocation
extends Object
implements ISourceLocation
    Common class to store file/location information across all source types such as AS, CSS etc

    • Field Summary
